ocaml/tools/ci/inria/bootstrap/script - ocaml

Functions defined

  • arch_error

Source code

  1. #!/bin/sh
  2. #**************************************************************************
  3. #*                                                                        *
  4. #*                                 OCaml                                  *
  5. #*                                                                        *
  6. #*          Damien Doligez, projet Gallium, INRIA Rocquencourt            *
  7. #*                                                                        *
  8. #*   Copyright 2014 Institut National de Recherche en Informatique et     *
  9. #*     en Automatique.                                                    *
  10. #*                                                                        *
  11. #*   All rights reserved.  This file is distributed under the terms of    *
  12. #*   the GNU Lesser General Public License version 2.1, with the          *
  13. #*   special exception on linking described in the file LICENSE.          *
  14. #*                                                                        *
  15. #**************************************************************************

  17. # This script is run on Inria's continuous-integration servers to make sure
  18. # it is possible to bootstrap the compiler.

  20. # To know the slave's architecture, this script looks at the OCAML_ARCH
  21. # environment variable. For a given node NODE, this variable can be defined
  22. # in Jenkins at the following address:
  23. # https://ci.inria.fr/ocaml/computer/NODE/configure

  25. # Other environments variables that are honored:
  26. #   OCAML_CONFIGURE_OPTIONS   additional options for configure
  27. #   OCAML_JOBS                number of jobs to run in parallel (make -j)

  29. # Command-line arguments:
  30. # -conf configure-option  add configure-option to configure cmd line
  31. # -patch1 file-name       apply patch with -p1
  32. # -no-native              do not build "opt" and "opt.opt"
  33. # -jNN                    pass "-jNN" option to make for parallel builds

  35. ‌error () {
  36.   echo "$1" >&2
  37.   exit 3
  38. }

  40. ‌arch_error() {
  41.   configure_url="https://ci.inria.fr/ocaml/computer/${NODE_NAME}/configure"
  42.   msg="Unknown architecture. Make sure the OCAML_ARCH environment"
  43.   msg="$msg variable has been defined."
  44.   msg="$msg\nSee ${configure_url}"
  45.   error "$msg"
  46. }

  48. # Kill a task on Windows
  49. # Errors are ignored
  50. ‌kill_task()
  51. {
  52.   task=$1
  53.   taskkill /f /im ${task} /t || true
  54. }

  56. ‌quote1 () {
  57.   printf "'%s'" "`printf %s "$1" | sed -e "s/'/'\\\\\\\\''/g"`";
  58. }

  60. # Functions used to modify the source code

  62. ‌change_exe_magic_number() {
  63.   old=`./runtime/ocamlrun -M`
  64.   new="$1"
  65.   echo Changing executable magic number from ${old} to ${new}
  66.   # Change magic number in runtime/caml/exec.h
  67.   sed -i.tmp 's/\x23define \+EXEC_MAGIC \+\x22'${old}\
  68. '\x22/#define EXEC_MAGIC "'${new}'"/' runtime/caml/exec.h
  69.   rm -f runtime/caml/exec.h.tmp
  70.   # Change magic number in utils/config.common.ml
  71.   sed -i.tmp 's/let \+exec_magic_number \+= \+\x22'${old}\
  72. '\x22/let exec_magic_number = "'${new}'"/' utils/config.common.ml
  73.   rm -f utils/config.common.ml.tmp
  74. }

  76. ‌remove_primitive()
  77. {
  78.   echo Removing the \'sinh\' primitive
  79.   patch -p1 < tools/ci/inria/bootstrap/remove-sinh-primitive.patch
  80. }

  82. #########################################################################
  83. # be verbose
  84. set -x

  86. #########################################################################
  87. # Save the current directory (on cygwin, /etc/profile changes it)
  88. jenkinsdir="$(pwd)"
  89. echo jenkinsdir=${jenkinsdir}

  91. #########################################################################
  92. # If we are called from a Windows batch script, we must set up the
  93. # Unix environment variables (e.g. PATH).

  95. case "${OCAML_ARCH}" in
  96.   bsd|macos|linux|solaris) ;;
  97.   cygwin|cygwin64|mingw|mingw64)
  98.    . /etc/profile
  99.    . "$HOME/.profile"
  100.   ;;
  101.   msvc)
  102.    . /etc/profile
  103.    . "$HOME/.profile"
  104.    . "$HOME/.msenv32"
  105.   ;;
  106.   msvc64)
  107.    . /etc/profile
  108.    . "$HOME/.profile"
  109.    . "$HOME/.msenv64"
  110.   ;;
  111.   *) arch_error;;
  112. esac

  114. #########################################################################

  116. # be considerate towards other potential users of the test machine
  117. case "${OCAML_ARCH}" in
  118.   bsd|macos|linux) renice 10 $$ ;;
  119. esac

  121. # be verbose and stop on error
  122. set -ex

  124. #########################################################################
  125. # set up variables

  127. # default values
  128. make=make
  129. instdir="$HOME/ocaml-tmp-install"
  130. confoptions="--enable-ocamltest --enable-dependency-generation \
  131. ${OCAML_CONFIGURE_OPTIONS}"
  132. make_native=true
  133. cleanup=false
  134. check_make_alldepend=false
  135. dorebase=false
  136. jobs=''
  137. build=''
  138. host=''

  140. case "${OCAML_ARCH}" in
  141.   bsd|solaris) make=gmake ;;
  142.   macos) ;;
  143.   linux)
  144.     check_make_alldepend=true
  145.   ;;
  146.   cygwin)
  147.     cleanup=true
  148.     check_make_alldepend=true
  149.   ;;
  150.   cygwin64)
  151.     cleanup=true
  152.     check_make_alldepend=true
  153.     dorebase=true
  154.   ;;
  155.   mingw)
  156.     build='--build=i686-pc-cygwin'
  157.     host='--host=i686-w64-mingw32'
  158.     instdir='C:/ocamlmgw'
  159.     cleanup=true
  160.     check_make_alldepend=true
  161.   ;;
  162.   mingw64)
  163.     build='--build=x86_64-pc-cygwin'
  164.     host='--host=x86_64-w64-mingw32'
  165.     instdir='C:/ocamlmgw64'
  166.     cleanup=true
  167.     check_make_alldepend=true
  168.   ;;
  169.   msvc)
  170.     build='--build=i686-pc-cygwin'
  171.     host='--host=i686-pc-windows'
  172.     instdir='C:/ocamlms'
  173.     configure=nt
  174.     cleanup=true
  175.   ;;
  176.   msvc64)
  177.     build='--build=x86_64-pc-cygwin'
  178.     host='--host=x86_64-pc-windows'
  179.     instdir='C:/ocamlms64'
  180.     configure=nt
  181.     cleanup=true
  182.   ;;
  183.   *) arch_error;;
  184. esac

  186. # Make sure two builds won't use the same install directory
  187. instdir="$instdir-$$"

  189. case "${OCAML_JOBS}" in
  190.   [1-9]|[1-9][0-9]) jobs="-j${OCAML_JOBS}" ;;
  191. esac

  193. #########################################################################
  194. # On Windows, cleanup processes that may remain from previous run

  196. if $cleanup; then
  197.   tasks="tee ocamlrun program ocamltest ocamltest.opt"
  198.   for task in ${tasks}; do kill_task ${task}.exe; done
  199. fi

  201. #########################################################################
  202. # Go to the right directory

  204. pwd
  205. cd "$jenkinsdir"

  207. #########################################################################
  208. # parse optional command-line arguments (has to be done after the "cd")

  210. while [ $# -gt 0 ]; do
  211.   case $1 in
  212.     -conf) confoptions="$confoptions `quote1 "$2"`"; shift;;
  213.     -patch1) patch -f -p1 <"$2"; shift;;
  214.     -no-native) make_native=false;;
  215.     -j[1-9]|-j[1-9][0-9]) jobs="$1";;
  216.     *) error "unknown option $1";;
  217.   esac
  218.   shift
  219. done

  221. #########################################################################
  222. # Do the work

  224. # Tell gcc to use only ASCII in its diagnostic outputs.
  225. export LC_ALL=C

  227. $make -s distclean || :

  229. # `make distclean` does not clean the files from previous versions that
  230. # are not produced by the current version, so use `git clean` in addition.
  231. git clean -f -d -x

  233. # Also make a hard reset
  234. git reset --hard HEAD

  236. if $flambda; then
  237.   confoptions="$confoptions -enable-flambda --enable-flambda-invariants"
  238. fi
  239. eval "./configure $build $host --prefix='$instdir' $confoptions"

  241. $make world

  243. change_exe_magic_number "CI-bootstrap"

  245. remove_primitive

  247. $make coreall
  248. $make bootstrap

One Level Up Top Level
